Middle School High Jump Milestone: Breaking 5 Feet!
Witnessed something special last Friday - one of my students clearing 5 feet in the high jump! A tremendous accomplishment that deserves recognition, especially for a middle school athlete.
That combination of technique, determination, and raw athletic ability at such a young age is genuinely impressive. The look of concentration before the jump and the celebration after clearing the bar tells the whole story of hard work paying off.
As both his teacher and photographer, it‚Äôs particularly rewarding to document these milestone moments. This is just the beginning - can‚Äôt wait to see what personal records he‚Äôll set in the coming years!
More pics at z-photography.com.

Saints Middle School Track & Field Athletes Show Their Skills
Managed to break away from the classroom last Friday to capture some of our middle school track and field athletes in action! Though my time was limited before the rain arrived, it was great to document these young competitors giving their all in shot put and long jump events.
The dedication and technique these athletes display at such a young age is impressive - from the focus needed for field events to the explosive power in their movements. Their hard work and commitment definitely shows!
Always a privilege to support our Saints athletes across all sports. Great work, guys!

Saints 7s Finish Strong with Victory Over Collegiate
The Saints 7s capped off their season with an impressive win against Collegiate on Thursday! Our young athletes displayed remarkable teamwork, skill, and determination from start to finish.
It was truly a complete team effort with everyone contributing to the victory. The future looks bright for these players as they continue to develop their skills and passion for the game.
Proud to have captured these moments from the sidelines and excited to watch their progress in seasons to come. Great job, Saints!
More pics at z-photography.com.

Saints 8th Grade Lacrosse Shows Strong Against Freeman JV
The future of Saints lacrosse was on full display as our 8th graders battled Freeman‚Äôs JV squad in an exciting matchup! Despite falling short by just one goal, these young athletes demonstrated incredible skill, teamwork, and determination throughout the contest.
From face-offs to fast breaks, these players showed they‚Äôre ready to make their mark on the JV and varsity programs next season. Great hustle on both sides of the ball!
Don‚Äôt miss your last chance to see varsity lax in action at home - final home match TOMORROW! Come out and support your Saints!
